protein.specific_function: Inactivates MAP kinases. Has a specificity for the ERK family.

go_class.description: hydrolase activity, acting on ester bonds

reference.reference_text: Muda M, Boschert U, Smith A, Antonsson B, Gillieron C, Chabert C, Camps M, Martinou I, Ashworth A, Arkinstall S: Molecular cloning and functional characterization of a novel mitogen-activated protein kinase phosphatase, MKP-4. J Biol Chem. 1997 Feb 21;272(8):5141-51.
